borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li>D02 - Existing Ground Floor and Roof Plans - 14/07/2023<br></li><li>D07 - Existing block plan - 14/07/2023</li><li>D05 - Proposed Elevations - 14/07/2023</li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>

<p>a) The glass in the windows and door on the East elevation of the outbuilding hereby approved shall be replaced with glass that is obscure glass to a level equivalent to Pilkington Level 3 or above and be non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened is more than 1.7 metres above the finished floor level of the room in which the window is installed.</p><p>b) Both requirements described under part a) of this condition shall be completely installed in accordance with these requirements one (1) month from the date of this permission and details of compliance must be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.</p><p>c) The replacement windows as approved shall thereafter be maintained and retained in accordance with these details, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp;</p>

The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the enjoyment of the dwellinghouse as such. It shall not be used for purposes conflicting with the use of the property as a single dwellinghouse, and in particular it shall not be used as a separate unit of accommodation.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing dwellinghouse.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Retrospective application for the construction of an outbuilding in the rear garden
